Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.utility

Class Config

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.utility.Config
public class Config extends Object
Utility static class responsible for loading and storing all the configuration data.

    • loadConfig

      public static void loadConfig(String path) throws FileNotFoundException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Loads the configuration from the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - path to the configuration file throws FileNotFoundException if the file is not found throws JsonProcessingException if the file is not in JSON format
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
